conditions.label: ANYTIME

Flexible ticket with no time restrictions on when you can travel. If the ticket includes Rail & Sail, then rail travel to/from Stranraer plus connecting ferry crossing(s) to/from Belfast with Stenaline is included.
Your journey must be on the date, or the day after the date, specified on the ticket
There is no advance purchase requirement associated with this ticket. Rail & Sail Anytime tickets are subject to availability based on ferry capacity only up to the close of reservations.
Refunds are available, subject to a GBP10.00 administration fee on unused tickets surrendered up to 28 days after expiry of the ticket.
Travel plans can be changed before the outward journey subject to a GBP10.00 administration fee.
Yes normal Railcard and child discounts apply, with the exception of Rail & Sail tickets where only Senior and 16 - 25 Railcard discounts and child discounts apply.
You may start, break and resume, or end your journey at any intermediate station along the route.
Rail & Sail Anytime tickets are available for Standard Class travel only.  Upgrades to First Class are not available. Weekend First supplements are not valid with Rail & Sail Anytime tickets.
Mobile Tickets and etickets aren't valid for travel on London Underground. See our FAQs for more info.
Travel is allowed via any permitted route.
